title: Ms problem when only attack a enemy champs in pvp

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
First I was playing with Fizz and like the Minute 8.5 my champ move without other places then I  not command with my mouse. Enemy players was like teleport to other places and my champ R dint hit the enemy  champ. My game never attempting to reconnect, all was perfect. I know other players then pass week and this week have the same problems only when they attack the enemy champ on PVP.  My pings are 88, 87, 86, 85 and I have my interface in very low, shadows off  and game mute sound to improve my gameplay.

Please Tell me how to Fix the problem 
Thanks  
Thorn Fierce Red

replies.body: It sounds like your network might be having some problems with packet loss causing this strange teleporting and such. If you could, grab the network log from that game and have this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Post a screenshot of what it gives you back here so I can take a look!
